body:
See attached,

It is working but is not "healthy".

There is a problem with the analysisPeriod component and the results obtained from different simulations. I mentioned this issue in another discussion (can't recall which one).

See at the right the yellow group. Instead of connecting the analysisPeriod to the HB_MicroclimateMap i connected a HOY. It works and shows the selected hour, but ...

The legend shows a wrong month (March instead of April). When you go to hour 17 it crashes also. Don't understand why.

Notice that also the KB_selectAndAverageData is failing (trying to divide by zero). So, something is going on there and i can't catch it exactly. Maybe it is related to some "Line meshes" output in the HB_IndoorViewFactor.



Will be glad if Chris can have a look or give his opinion on this.

-A.
